life.threedee.game

Class GhostPlane

  • java.lang.Object
    • life.threedee.Plane
      • life.threedee.TexturedPlane
        • life.threedee.game.GhostPlane
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ThreeDeeObject

    public class GhostPlane
extends TexturedPlane
    The graphical element of the side of a ghost.

    • Constructor Detail

      • GhostPlane

        public GhostPlane(Point origin,
          Point right,
          Point up,
          int ghostNum)
        Constructs a GhostPlane with 3 given points, and the number of the ghost that this plane is a part of.
        Parameters:
        origin - The origin point. Used in the same manner as in a TexturedPlane.
        right - The "right" point.
        up - The "up" point.
        ghostNum - The number of ghost for which this plane is a side.

      • GhostPlane

        public GhostPlane(Point point,
          Vector normal,
          int ghostNum)
        Constructs a GhostPlane with a given point, a normal vector, and the number of the ghost that this plane is a part of.
        Parameters:
        point - The origin point. Used in the same manner as in a TexturedPlane.
        normal - The normal vector.
        ghostNum - The number of ghost for which this plane is a side.
